findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner can update the automated market maker pair address, which could potentially lead to an unauthorized script upgrade.

findings.title: Owner Can Update Max Buy Amount Between 0.1% and 1%
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to update the maximum buy amount between 0.1% and 1%, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences or manipulation.

findings.title: Owner Can Update Max Sell Amount Between 0.1% and 1%
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update the maximum sell amount within a specific range.

findings.title: Owner can update total buy fees not greater than 15%
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update total buy fees up to a maximum of 15%.

findings.title: Owner can update total sell fees not greater than 20%
findings.description: The contract owner has the capability to update total sell fees up to a maximum of 20%.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.
